original_text: You must also offer friendship offerings there. Eat them with joy as you meet with the Lord your God.
korean_text: 또 화목제를 드리고 거기에서 먹으며 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워하라

sentences.original_text: You must also offer friendship offerings there.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그 곳에서 교제 제물을 드려야 한다.

sentences.original_text: as you meet with the Lord your God.
